mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID as orderId, O.ORDER_DATE as orderDate, O.TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, O.ORDER_STATUS as status, O.USER_ID as uerId, O.CARD_NUM as cardNum, SUBSTR(O.CARD_DATE, 0, INSTR(O.CARD_DATE, '/') - 1) as cardMonth, SUBSTR(O.CARD_DATE, INSTR(O.CARD_DATE, '/')+ 1) as cardYear, O.CARD_NAME as cardName, PO.SHIP_NAME as shipName, SUBSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, 0, INSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, '-') - 1) as shipPhone1, SUBSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, INSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, '-') + 1, INSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, '-') - 1) as shipPhone2, SUBSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, INSTR(PO.SHIP_PHONE, '-',1,2) + 1) as shipPhone3, PO.SHIP_EMAIL as shipEmail, PO.SHIP_ZIP as shipZip, PO.SHIP_ADDRESS as shipAddress FROM ORDERINFO O, PRODUCT_ORDER PO WHERE O.ORDER_ID = PO.ORDER_ID AND O.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT PL.PRODUCT_ID as productId, P.PRODUCT_NAME as productName, PL.QUANTITY as quantity, PL.UNIT_PRICE as unitPrice, P.PRODUCT_IMG as productImg FROM PRODUCT P, PRODUCT_ORDER PO, PRODUCT_LINEITEM PL WHERE PO.ORDER_ID = PL.ORDER_ID AND PL.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND PO.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
